author: automotivetestingtechnologyinternational.com
title: Latest News : Automotive Testing Technology International
text:
SHOW LIVE: Link introduces modular data acquisition system
Link Engineering is once again in attendance at this year's Expo in North America and is featuring many of its products, including the new V-Max 4000, which provides users with the latest technology for modular data acquisition.
Link's engineers designed the V-Max's chassis with interlocking and easily interchangeable modules. The modules are individually designed to measure analogue, digital, temperature, pulse, CAN, and NVH signals. V-Max 4000 is designed with ten times the sampling capacity of the model's predecessor, allowing much faster sample rates in the data.
It is also showcasing LabLINK, an advanced testing application that will streamline testing processes and help increase the utilization of test equipment. Visitors should also stop by Link Engineering's booth for more information on all of its product lines for brake and friction, transmission and driveline, and wheel end testing.
